value:
$WmMPID_ケント,ch03_35_Kent_M_Normal,Face|Hmm... You would request our aid
in drawing up a revised map of Askr?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|That's right. There's a remote region
in the southwest that we're lacking
recent intelligence on.$k$pOn the surface, it may not seem like
the kind of flashy work we usually
ask you Heroes to do, but...$k$pWell, I suspect that you'll find no end
of unsavory elements lurking among
the trees and rocks.$k$p$WmMPID_ギィ,ch03_36_Guy_M_Normal,Face|Gotcha. So we're really there to
stamp out the bandits...while also
updating the map, of course.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Exactly! Oh, and just a heads-up: this
is the most recent one we have...from
fifty years ago.$k$pThere's been an earthquake since
then, so be careful.$k$p$WmMPID_セイン,ch03_34_Sein_M_Normal,Face|Five decades is a lot of time for the
landscape to change. This map may
not be of much use.$k$p$WmMPID_ケント,ch03_35_Kent_M_Normal,Face|Perhaps not. But that is all the more
reason for us to accept this mission
to update it.$k$pBoth the merchants and military of
Askr will surely be served by access
to more modern maps.$k$p$WmMPID_セイン,ch03_34_Sein_M_Normal,Face|Most men would scoff at the mere
thought of being made to do such
menial labor, but not I!$k$pYou see, ladies? The gallant Sain will
never shirk his duty to you or the
Order of Heroes!$k$p$WmMPID_ギィ,ch03_36_Guy_M_Normal,Face|I'm in. I can't be the most skilled
swordsman in Sacae if I let some
bandits get the best of me, right?$k$pI've been itching for a battlefield to
test my blade, and this looks like my
chance. Leave it to me, Commander!$k$p$WmMPID_開花フロリーナ,ch03_08_Flolina_F_Bloom01,Face|Um... I'll join too... If that's all right.$k$pI've got a bird's-eye view from my
pegasus, so I can make sure the map
looks accurate from above.$k$p$WmMPID_ケント,ch03_35_Kent_M_Normal,Face|Such a high vantage point will prove
invaluable in our map-making efforts.
Thank you.$k$p$WmMPID_開花フロリーナ,ch03_08_Flolina_F_Bloom01,Face|Oh! Um... You're welcome...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|I'm coming too! You've got the sky
covered, but what about the ground?$k$pMy Gullinbursti can traverse rocky
terrain like it's nothing. Just point me
where to go, and I'll be there!$k$p$WmMPID_セイン,ch03_34_Sein_M_Normal,Face|The more ladies, the merrier!
Welcome aboard, Princess Reginn!$k$p$WmMPID_ケント,ch03_35_Kent_M_Normal,Face|Sain, need I remind you that we are
embarking on a mission, not a picnic?$k$pThis will be our first official duty after
being summoned to Askr. We must
not take it lightly.$k$pPrincess Reginn, if Sain happens to
bother you, simply say the word and
I will deal with him myself.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Oh, uh... If you say so. But I'd really
prefer it if we all just got along!$k$p$WmMPID_セイン,ch03_34_Sein_M_Normal,Face|Alas, it seems that the ladies of Askr
have about as much trust in me as
those of Elibe...$k$p$WmMPID_ギィ,ch03_36_Guy_M_Normal,Face|It may not be a picnic, but we should
still prepare plenty of provisions in
case we're gone for a while.$k$p$WmMPID_開花フロリーナ,ch03_08_Flolina_F_Bloom01,Face|Good idea. I, um... I'll try not to slow
us down too much.$k$p
